cves.description: For an authenticated end-user the portal may run a script while attempting to display a directory or some file's properties.

versions.version: Check Point Mobile Access versions R81.10, R81.20, R82

problemType: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting').

cves.description: Authenticated end-user may set a specially crafted SNX bookmark that can make their browser run a script while accessing their own bookmark list.

versions.version: Check Point Mobile Access versions R81.10, R81.20, R82

problemType: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting').
